name: Gutter Brawl
description:
Gutter Brawl - Turn based combat , without unit selection. 

All of your units respond to the same move and attack orders. 

Red Vs Blue: 

This game is made for 2 players sharing a computer, 3 actions per turn.

Your 3 units have different attack patterns and movement speeds.

Made for GMTK game(jam); 2018

Theme: Genre, without Mechanic

Built with:

Unity game engine (free license)

FMOD audio engine (free license)

Created by:

Adam Bethell: Programming

Toby Misselbrook: Audio Design

Tom Bethell: Art
